summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Ida Street from 39th Avenue Southwest to 44th Avenue Southwest; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by grading and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9430 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of " Payment in Bonds".
